NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Community Health Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 09:38 IST
 National Health Mission
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 30,000 to 30,000




FOLLOW

The National Health Mission Gujarat (NHM Gujarat) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Community Health Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date. Candidates who have completed their B. Sc Nursing can apply for the NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Gujarat.

NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts 	Vacancies	Education
Community Health Officer	01	B.Sc Nursing

NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 40 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic salary: Rs. 30,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the NHM Gujarat Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form for further use.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-08-2025
Closing date	30-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
